reasoning_log: The input provided 12 descriptions but only 11 unique image candidates (Image_1 through Image_11). To fulfill the requirement of providing a 1:1 match for every description, one image had to be reused. The images were first categorized into two main studio layouts (Studio A: Balcony view, Dark Desk; Studio B: Wardrobe view, No Balcony) and two staircase views. Descriptions 9 and 10 were matched to the distinct staircase images (Image_8 and Image_9). The remaining 10 studio descriptions were matched based on specific visual cues (e.g., Desc_7 required a view showing the ceiling light and centered AC, best fit by Image_7; Desc_2 required a clear view of the green sofa and coffee table, best fit by Image_3). Desc_6, being a generic description emphasizing the 'full set' of furniture and crowdedness, was assigned to Image_1, which provides a comprehensive view of Studio A's layout, necessitating the reuse of this image to complete the 12 required mappings.

matching_result_list.evidence: Features a balcony (陽台空間), visible AC (有冷氣), tiled floor (磁磚地板), and strong natural light (採光佳), fitting the Studio A layout.
Clearly shows the green sofa and black coffee table (已附沙發茶几) defining the dual functional area (雙功能區). The furniture and wallpaper appear older (家具較老舊).
Highlights the 'small living room' configuration (小客廳配置) with the sofa and table, and the large black wardrobe providing medium storage (收納空間中等).
Focuses on the integrated desk/work station (書桌工作位) within the single room, confirming concentrated living functions.
Shows the complete utilization of space, packing the bed, desk, sofa (partially visible), and large wardrobe into the room (空間利用完整).
Generic description of a 'full set' studio (全配套房) with crowded furniture (略擁擠). Image_1 provides a comprehensive view confirming all listed items (REUSE due to input constraint).
This view clearly shows the ceiling light (室內照明設備) and the AC unit positioned centrally above the balcony door (冷氣位置居中).
The AC unit is positioned to blow directly across the room towards the bed/desk area (空調直吹範圍大), and light/ventilation originate from the same balcony direction.
Shows the staircase landing with a window, visible '3F' text, and signs of wear/clutter, fitting the 'maintenance average' tag (公共空間維護普通).
A close-up view confirming the tiled steps (防滑瓷磚地面) and relatively weak natural lighting (採光偏弱).
The angle clearly illustrates the continuous flow (動線連貫) from the foreground desk area past the bed to the sofa/balcony.

tag_list: 插座與網路位可能集中

matching_result_list.evidence: Confirms the rectangular layout (格局長方型) and shows the natural light from the balcony hitting the bed headboard area (採光照到床頭).
